tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    appliance VARCHAR(255),
    energy_consumed DECIMAL(10, 2),
    voice_command VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE efficiency_optimization (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    optimization_type VARCHAR(50),
    optimization_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyDevices (
  device_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  user_id INT,
  energy_consumption DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES EnergyUsers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE VoiceCommands (
  command_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  command VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES EnergyDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EfficiencyStatistics (
  stat_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  efficiency_factor DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES EnergyDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
  pref_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  preferred_device_id INT,
  voice_command VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES EnergyUsers(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (preferred_device_id) REFERENCES EnergyDevices(device_id)
);
